backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user, business, customer, item, invoice, and GST filing data models with storage maps and access control mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, titles, associated files, components, and test references for recent fixes and UI changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend components, pages, utilities, and PWA files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, light/dark themes, and base UI styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry file configuring meta tags, PWA manifest, icons, and extensive iOS splash screen assets.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, colors, icons, and launch behavior for GST Pro.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker caching static assets, cleaning old caches, and handling fetch requests with network-first or cache-first strategies.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST.md: Manual smoke-test checklist outlining authentication, admin panel, and user-management test steps after deployment.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app root configuring React Query, router, themes, service worker registration, and global error boundary.

frontend/src/components/admin/AdminCrede: Admin login form that authenticates via user ID and password, handling validation and error display.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminOnlyG: Gates content behind an admin check, showing loading and unauthorized states as needed.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPorta: Layout wrapper for admin pages with optional back navigation and a title header.
frontend/src/components/admin/CreateCred: Empty placeholder file for a credential creation dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/Credential: Empty placeholder file intended for listing and managing credentials.
frontend/src/components/admin/ResetPassw: Empty placeholder file for a password reset dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/RevokeCred: Empty placeholder file for revoking user credentials.
frontend/src/components/admin/SetAccessU: Dialog allowing admins to set or clear a user's access expiry timestamp with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/SetCredent: Empty placeholder file for modifying a credential’s role.
frontend/src/components/admin/UsersTable: Displays all users with actions for viewing dashboards, deleting users, and managing access expiry.
frontend/src/components/AppAccessGate.ts: No-op wrapper component that always renders children; access control disabled for version 9.
frontend/src/components/AppAccessLoginFo: Deprecated login form UI kept for compatibility, instructing users to sign in via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: Error boundary catching rendering errors and displaying a fallback screen.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Top-level layout with header, navigation, footer, and logo branding for the main application.
frontend/src/components/auth/CredentialS: Provides a credential-based sign‑in form with client-side validation and mutation handling for email/password login.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignUpDialo: Implements a modal dialog for user sign‑up with validation, error display, success message handling, and form reset logic.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication guard handling Internet Identity login, credential login UI, and loading or sign‑in screens.
frontend/src/components/customers/Custom: Modal form for adding or editing customers, syncing form state, validating input, and calling backend mutations.
Displays a customer list with edit/delete actions, delete confirmation, and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/components/ErrorFallbackScr: Fallback UI for unhandled errors with reload and optional sign‑in actions.
frontend/src/components/FirstAdminSetupD: Empty placeholder file for first‑admin setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/forms/Scrollable: Wraps SelectContent to enforce consistent scroll behavior with a max height and iOS-friendly scrolling.
frontend/src/components/gst/GstProfileSe: Renders GST profile details and status badges from filing status data in a structured card layout.
frontend/src/components/invoices/Invoice: Editor component for managing invoice line items, allowing item selection, quantity/price updates, and row add/remove actions.
Renders a status badge for an invoice based on its status enum.
frontend/src/components/invoices/Monthly: Generates monthly aggregated invoice totals and displays them in a card and table layout with optional filtering.
frontend/src/components/items/ItemFormDi: Dialog form for creating or editing an item with validation and submit handlers.
frontend/src/components/items/ItemsTable: Displays a table of items with edit and delete actions and handles delete confirmation.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Handles sign‑in and sign‑out actions with Internet Identity and updates app/auth state.
frontend/src/components/MobileNav.tsx: Mobile navigation drawer with links and an external E‑Way Bill shortcut.
frontend/src/components/PrintLayout.tsx: Minimal authenticated layout for print views including profile setup.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Prompts new users for their name and saves it via a profile mutation, showing a dialog only when no profile exists.
frontend/src/components/pwa/IosInstallHe: Dialog showing step-by-step instructions for installing the app on iOS.
frontend/src/components/pwa/PwaInstallFo: Footer section offering PWA installation options for Android and iOS, including dialogs and install prompts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminCredentialSig: Provides a mutation for admin credential authentication using the current actor and refreshes admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminUserDashboard: Fetches user invoice KPIs and retrieves user details from the users list for admin dashboards.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminUsers.ts: Admin utilities for listing, creating, deleting users, setting access expiry, and fetching all user types.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReady.ts: Checks if the backend actor is ready and returns readiness state with a helper message.
frontend/src/hooks/useCredentialSignIn.t: Handles user sign‑in via Internet Identity plus credential authentication and refreshes all queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches and saves the caller’s user profile using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, loading, login, logout, and identity management via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Queries whether the current user is an admin with caching and loading-state helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrintOnce.ts: Triggers window.print once when ready and optionally runs a callback after printing.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Tracks PWA installability, handles beforeinstallprompt events, and exposes an install prompt function.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for loading and mutating user, business, and customer data via the backend actor, with cache updates and validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecordInternetIden: Defines a helper hook that retries until the actor is available and then logs Internet Identity sign‑in events without blocking UI flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeInternetIdenti: Implements a safe login wrapper that retries after clearing stale Internet Identity sessions and exposes login state flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useSignUp.ts: Exports a mutation hook that calls the backend to register a new user with email, password, and mobile credentials.
frontend/src/index.css: Global TailwindCSS styles defining theme variables, dark mode, safe‑area handling, mobile touch improvements, and print‑friendly rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app by mounting it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Renders the admin login flow for non‑admin users and the admin management interface for authorized users.
frontend/src/pages/AdminUserDashboardPag: Displays an admin‑only dashboard with user details, sign‑in info, and invoice KPI statistics.
frontend/src/pages/CustomersPage.tsx: Shows a searchable customers list with error handling and dialogs for adding or editing customer records.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays overview KPIs for invoices, customers, items, and GST totals, with navigation to invoice creation and setup prompts.
frontend/src/pages/GstFilingStatusPage.t: Fetches and displays GST filing status for a GSTIN with filters for FY, return type, and frequency, including search and refresh actions.
frontend/src/pages/InvoiceDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed invoice info, totals, and actions like edit, finalize, cancel, delete, or print.
frontend/src/pages/InvoiceEditorPage.tsx: Form for creating or editing invoices with customer selection, line items, totals calculation, and save logic.
frontend/src/pages/InvoicePrintPage.tsx: Generates a printable invoice layout with tax breakdown, totals, banking details, and auto-triggered print behavior.
frontend/src/pages/InvoicesPage.tsx: Invoices list page with filters for status, date, year, and month, plus loading state and navigation to invoice actions.
frontend/src/pages/ItemsPage.tsx: Provides item search, listing, and create/edit dialog handling with error display.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Business profile settings form with logo upload, validation, and backend save integration.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker, checks for updates periodically, and logs update availability.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the full TanStack Router route tree including layouts, main app pages, print pages, and admin routes.
frontend/src/utils/adminTimeFormat.ts: Utility functions to convert backend nanosecond timestamps to readable date/time strings and back.
frontend/src/utils/amountInWordsINR.ts: Converts numeric rupee amounts into Indian English words using crore/lakh grouping.
frontend/src/utils/appAccessStorage.ts: LocalStorage helpers for deprecated per‑principal app access state management.
frontend/src/utils/dateFormat.ts: Utilities for formatting invoice dates and extracting year/month values.
frontend/src/utils/financialYears.ts: Generates a list of recent Indian financial year strings based on the current date.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Formats numbers as INR currency using Indian locale rules.
frontend/src/utils/gstCalculations.ts: Computes invoice totals including GST, discounts, and inter/intra‑state tax split, with helpers for formatting and invoice-based calculation.
frontend/src/utils/gstFilingStatusDispla: Normalizes GST filing status strings into consistent labels and returns display variants for badges.
frontend/src/utils/indianStates.ts: Exports a constant list of all Indian states and union territories.
frontend/src/utils/invoiceNumbering.ts: Generates formatted invoice numbers using business profile settings and falls back to stored invoice numbers when available.
frontend/src/utils/invoiceRules.ts: Allows all invoices to be deleted and returns a fixed error message for deletion failures.
frontend/src/utils/invoiceTaxBreakdown.t: Builds HSN/SAC‑grouped GST tax breakdowns for invoices and computes totals based on inter/intra‑state rules.
frontend/src/utils/passwordHash.ts: Empty placeholder file for password hashing utilities.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash‑based routing parameters.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Converts various error types into cleaned, user‑friendly messages with special handling for auth, network, and GST errors.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, layouts, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project's current state, known issues, architecture notes, and version metadata.
